mapper.insert: INSERT INTO courses (cno, cName, year, dayOfWeek, time, startWeek, endWeek, credit, type, semester, select_people, total_people) VALUES (#{cno}, #{cName}, #{year}, #{dayOfWeek}, #{time}, #{startWeek}, #{endWeek}, #{credit}, #{type}, #{semester}, #{selectPeople}, #{totalPeople})
mapper.select: SELECT sc.cno FROM students s INNER JOIN course_selection sc ON S.sno = sc.sno WHERE s.sno = #{sno};
SELECT MAX(cno) AS max_cno FROM courses;
